overview:
Joe Devine is a strategic executive with significant experience in the gestation and scaling of online retail startups.

In addition to his almost ten years with Texas Instruments, he’s held the position of CTO with Safeway.com, Motosport.com, and eBags.com - where he also held the VP of Marketing title.

Devine currently runs operations for SecureLink, an enterprise software company providing secure remote access solutions for software vendors and security conscious enterprises.
